name: Gone Fishing! (itch)
description:
Godot Wild Jam #41:

Ocean Theme with the wild card of Fishing Mini-game submission.

You are a happy bear gone fishing! How high of a score can you get?

Made with Godot Engine, in about 5 hours.

Instructions:

Move mouse to move your fishing hook. 

Touch fish to get points. 

If you catch a dead fish, it's game over!

Assets from OpenGameArt.org:

Mepavi @ You're Perfect Studio https://opengameart.org/content/fishing-bear

Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio https://opengameart.org/content/gone-fishin

Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio https://opengameart.org/content/fisheefects
